question: 可也
sourceMnemonic: It's <kanji>possible</kanji> that it's <kanji>considerably</kanji> considerable. It's <vocabulary>considerably</vocabulary>, <vocabulary>fairly</vocabulary>, and <vocabulary>quite</vocabulary>... something. Also please note that this is almost always written in kana and not kanji. But, we're learning kanji here, so gosh darn it we're going to learn some kanji.
sourceReadingMnemonic: The reading is the same as the reading you learned with the kanji.
